amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to decommission a Naval or Marine Corps Reserve aviation squadron pending a Comptroller General report on the requirements of the Navy and Marine Corps for tactical aviation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1298 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1298 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S9562-9563; text: CR S9563) To prohibit the use of funds to decommission a Naval or Marine Corps Reserve aviation squadron pending a Comptroller General report on the requirements of the Navy and Marine Corps for tactical aviation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1298 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1298 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
